codeSystems.name: BasicAuditEntityType
codeSystems.title: Entity Types that are defined in IHE BasicAudit
codeSystems.description: These are new codes used in BasicAudit IG, where AuditEvent.entity is used to hold a specific kind of data that is not covered by the existing valueSet.

codeSystems.name: MHDlistTypes
codeSystems.title: MHD List Types
codeSystems.description: To use the List resource for two different use-cases we define a code-system with the types of List needed in MHD
